```{r setup}
library(bacontrees)
```

```{r}
alphabet <- Alphabet$new(LETTERS[1:3])
ct <- ContextTree$new(alphabet)
ct$fillByDepth(2)
ct
```

```{r}
set.seed(8)
sequences <- lapply(1:3, function(x) sample(LETTERS[1:3], 1000, replace = TRUE))
d <- Sequence$new(sequences)
```

```{r}
ct$setData(d)
ct$activateLeaves()
ct$getActiveNodes()
```
